fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Each night, choose a player: they die. Evils you kill this way keep their ability and roleblock 1 Town neighbor. Your kills are cleaned.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
You appear innocent.
If you survive until the end of the game, all evils will win, and the good faction will automatically lose.
All Neutral Killing roles and REF's are aware of who you are at the start of the game, and have an alternate wincon of protecting you whilst eliminating all Good faction members.
You cannot co-exist with other Neutral Demonic roles.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive until the end of the game.
